title: Bug 17825 - ControlExampleText beeps when SWT.MULTI is selected
description: Bug 17825 - ControlExampleText emits a 'ding' sound when SWT.MULTI is chosen. This behavior seems unintended.
OB: When I choose SWT.MULTI in the ControlExampleText, an unexpected sound is heard.
EB: When I choose SWT.MULTI in the ControlExampleText, no sound should be heard.
SR:
1. Open the ControlExampleText.
2. Select SWT.MULTI from the options.
3. Observe if any sound is heard.
